name: Legacy of Evil
storyline:
In Legacy of Evil there is no single hero, instead you control a diverse group of classic RPG heroes. Take command of warriors, mages, priests and more, each with unique skills and abilities. It's a dynamic system that allows you to combine characters' skills, creating a powerful and versatile group of heroes.
Join an epic battle to save the kingdom from the clutches of darkness in Legacy of Evil , a classic arcade shooter that puts you in command of a formidable group of legendary RPG heroes. Assemble a diverse group of warriors, mages, thieves and more, each with unique abilities and skills.
summary: Join legendary RPG heroes in 'Legacy of Evil,' a classic arcade Shoot 'em Up. Battle the sinister Dravlo Stradinic and his dark forces. Upgrade your heroes and face terrifying bosses. Can you defeat the vampire and save Stygia?
